subtitle: Series 1934 Federal Reserve Gold Certificate Bearer Instruments

executive_summary.overview: Goldbackbond Inc. represents approximately 108 1934 Federal Reserve Gold Certificate Bearer Instruments with strip coupons. These bonds are confirmed as valid and negotiable according to the US Treasury Manual, housed in three specially fabricated Bronze Boxes with supporting documentation. Goldbackbond Inc is an RWA and Bitcoin Treasury Company offering digital asset services and tenders to the private capital markets.
key_features: Federal Reserve Gold Certificate Bearer Instruments from 1934
Continuous US residence with confirmed chain of custody
Valid and negotiable according to US Treasury Manual
executive_summary.value_proposition: The bonds offer significant monetization opportunities through direct sale/purchase and collateralization, with valuations ranging from $2.32 billion per bond based on the 2025 independent evaluation, to $11.97 billion per bond in today's live spot gold value based on 100 metric tons of gold backing per bond.
